name: Soul Sader
description:
Soul Sader is a hardcore cross-scrolling RPG game.

You becomes the knight who notices the disaster that's coming.
A knight who has decided that his own power cannot prevent it wants to gain the power of other knights.
You can use the portal to get directly to where the knights are, but the other knights won't be obedient.

Each article has its own abilities and characteristics.
All you have to do is attack and avoid. But fighting won't be easy.
But you have the power of the soul, so you can continue to resurrect in the temple, and if you defeat the knight
you can equip soul and use new power.
You need energy when you use the power of a knight.
You get energy every time you succeed in an attack

Five knights are waiting for you.
Defeat all the knights and get the strength to stop the last disaster knight.


Controls

Movement can be done by pressing the left and right direction keys, and avoidance can be done by pressing the down direction keys along with the direction keys in the target direction.
To Equip the soul of the knight and use the power, you can use it by pressing Q when you have enough energy.
